content: AC-D SP Type 27 Cut-off wheel High-performance thin cut-off wheel with depressed center for cutting stainless/carbon steel using an angle grinder ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered to offer the best balance between longer disc lifetime and higher stock removal rate Type 27 depressed center – you can work at any angle without damaging the base material ANSI B7.1 compliant and OSA certified – these cutting wheels comply with the highest safety standards Applications Cutting steel and stainless steel pipes, rods, profiles and metal sheets Pipeline applications such as cutting and light notching steel or stainless steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Base material: Steel, Stainless steel Tool type: Angle grinder Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Steel, Stainless steel | Tool type | Angle grinder | Disclaimer | Use angle grinder with double-sided guard | Blade / disc shape | Depressed, Type 27 | Arbor size | 7/8 in ### ITEMS- 2235205 - Cutting disc 4.5 x .045 x 7/8 T27 SP - Package Size 25 pc - 2235206 - Cutting disc 5 x .045 x 7/8 T27 SP - Package Size 25 pc - 2235207 - Cutting disc 6 x .045 x 7/8 T27 SP - Package Size 25 pc - 2235176 - Cutting disc 7 x 1/16 x 7/8 T27 SP - Package Size 25 pc
